text: duniya aur aakharit dono mein aur ve aapase anaathon ke vishay mein prashn karate hain. unase kah deejie ki jis baat mein unaka sudhaar ho vahee sabase achchhee hai. yadi tum unase milakar raho, to ve tumhaare bhaee hee hain aur allaah jaanata hai ki kaun sudhaarane aur kaun bigaadane vaala hai aur yadi allaah chaahata, to tumapar sakhtee[1] kar deta. vaastav mein, allaah prabhutvashaalee, tatvagy hai
